snippet: Reese McGuire had two hits and two runs batted in to help the United States beat Canada, 6-2, in the under-18 world baseball championship in Seoul, South Korea.
lead_paragraph: Reese McGuire had two hits and two runs batted in to help the United States beat Canada, 6-2, in the under-18 world baseball championship in Seoul, South Korea.

headline.seo: U.S. Wins Under-18 World Baseball Championship
headline.main: U.S. Wins U-18 World Baseball Championship
